name: Safe Zone - Survive a Zombie-Infested Odyssey Across the USA
blurb: Safe Zone - Travel across a zombie-infested USA to a safe zone on the West coast.
ksr_blurb: <p>As if <i>The Oregon Trail</i> wasn't cool enough already, Blind Eye Games wants to throw a zombie-infested US into the mix. In this RPG adventure game, you\u2019re trapped on the wrong side of an army of the undead, and you'll have to use all your wits to get you to the "Safe Zone."</p>

rewards.reward: Standard Reward: We\u2019ll send you a thank you email letting you know just how cool you are, as well as a picture of a cat doing something hilarious! You'll also be listed as a sponsor on our website!
Standard Reward: Get a digital copy of the game when it is released! Plus the above reward.
Standard Reward: Get access to the closed beta. Plus all of the above.
Standard Reward: Create a recruitable party member! Choose their name, profession, tagged skills, perks, and even write a custom motto! (PG-13, please) Plus all of the above.
Standard Reward: Access to the alpha version of the game as it\u2019s being developed! Plus all of the above.
Standard Reward: Get an exclusive digital copy of the soundtrack with never before heard content! Plus all of the above.
Special Reward: Have a weapon named after you! Soon every zombie will fear the sting of of Bill\u2019s +3 Shotgun of bullet shooting! Plus every standard reward.
Special Reward: Work with the developers to add a (PG-13) secret item to the game! Plus every standard reward.
Special Reward: Send us a picture and we\u2019ll have our artist model a zombie after you! Plus every standard reward.
Special Reward: A copy of every game Blind Eye Games ever makes ever! Plus every standard reward.
EXTRA Special Reward: Receive every special reward and every standard reward! That's everything on this list for just $150!

Meet the creators! If you are near NYC, or Virginia Beach we'll grab a coffee with you and talk about Safe Zone. (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

Work with us to design a secret location on the map. That's a secret special place that a player might find on their journey, or might not! Maybe it has a special item in it. Who knows! (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

The tutorial of Safe Zone will be directed by a Bum that you'll meet. With this reward you can choose his name! (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

We'll invite you to sit in on one of our Safe Zone brainstorms via skype. First come first served, but odds are we'll do this before the kickstarter campaign even ends. There's lots of brainstorming to do. (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

This is a big one. At this pledge level you can work with us to design a special profession. As always, PG-13. (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

Wine and Dine with the creators! If you are near NYC, or Virginia Beach let us treat you to dinner. Oh the times we'll have! (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]

One of us will fly out to where ever you live (continental US only) and spend the day doing whatever. (This includes all Standard and Special Rewards)\r\n[This is not included in the $150 "everything on this list" reward.]
